name: 柏拉圖脫逃 Plato Escape
description:
語言: 中文、英文 | Language: Chinese, English

柏拉圖脫逃是一款像素風格平台動作遊戲。

玩家將扮演哲學家柏拉圖，在這個注意力稀缺的時代，嘗試從各種注意力陷阱中殺出一條血路，專心一致完成真實世界的目標。

社交訊息、彈出視窗、推送通知、網美網帥限時動態等......，這些注意力陷阱，充斥在我們的生活中，處心積慮要讓我們偏離真實世界的目標。

玩家必須謹慎地移動，理性地使用有限的注意力工具，才能幫助柏拉圖逃出這個可怕的處境。

你是否能幫助柏拉圖找出一線轉機呢?

鍵盤控制

左右移動 左右鍵 跳躍 空白鍵開啟/關閉物品 Z 使用神秘道具 X 暫停 Esc

Plato Escape is a pixel art platformer action game. 

You will play as the philosopher Plato, who, in the age of attention scarcity, attempts to run away from various attention traps and finally achieve a real-life goal. 

Social messages, pop-up dialog boxes, push notifications, stories and posts from influencers, etc. These attentions traps are everywhere in our life; they are schemes that lures us and lead us astray. 

To help Plato escape from his misery, you must be cautious when climbing up in the cave, and be mindful of the limited attention boosters. 

Can you make the story of Plato turn around?

Keyboard Control

Move Left/Right ArrowsJump Space Open/Close Item Z Use Secret Item X Pause Esc
